messages.subject: Re: What would -you- like to see?!
messages.msgSnippet: ... I d ask you ... about ... like to
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "Hirotada Tokugawa"
<patriot014@h...> wrote:
> I'm in a bit of a quandary as to what to draw next, so I thought
I'd ask you
> guys! What would you like to see? Aizu Women's Brigade? Mini-manga
about
> SHQ? Hijikata in a fundoshi? All of the above? Let me know-- I'd
like to
> start adding to our archive here!!
>
> --M.
>
> Hijikata in a fudoshi for me!

messages.subject: Re: What would -you- like to see?!
messages.msgSnippet: Reminder to the new members...Shimazuryu (Hirotada Tokugawa) has already contributed art at http://www.shinsengumihq.com/edoart.htm so check it out! Hmmmm what
messages.messageBody:
Reminder to the new members...Shimazuryu (Hirotada Tokugawa) has
already contributed art at http://www.shinsengumihq.com/edoart.htm
so check it out!

Hmmmm what would I like to see? Vengeful ghost of Yaso in the form
of a demoness hunting down her no good two timing husband Fujita
Goro....just kidding (based on *theory* we have bits and pieces of
history to go by)....

I'm not sure what I would like to see...this is a rated G
messageboard after all....I just can't help myself...

and maybe other fan-artists out there may like these ideas...

Aizu's Women's Brigade >>> in the hot springs! (with lots and lots
of steam to keep it -appropriate-)
and PMK Saitou + Hijikata peeping...LOL!
Saitou has superior stealth skills so he may get a better view than
HIJIKATA! <<< I know MissB will disagree with me on this

Or how about the Shinsengumi in cowboy outfits <<< based on some
weird RPG out there....RK SAITOU = as Sheriff Saitou!

We all want that NHK Shinsengumi fundoshi calendar...but what about
fanart of all the boys with just "fans" (recall NHK Shimada Kai's
horrible mistake of trying to wrestle with regular fundoshi!).

***NOTICE****
Shinsengumi Uniform Contest is still going on (^_^)
you can view the first entry at
http://p076.ezboard.com/fshinsengumiheadquartersfrm8.showMessage?
topicID=11.topic&index=2

http://www.shinsengumimb.com see FANART section
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/contest.htm

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] What would -you- like to see?!

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/13/2004 9:49:41 PM Eastern Standard Time,
bsher213@... writes:
I want those Suzuki boys in their silk fundoshi!!

Yeah that's a big surprise huh?

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
Why just one or two of them? Hey M, how about drawing -all- the boys in their
fundoshi? LOL! (But a solo of Hijikata-sama in his would be nice too! ^_~)

-MissB

messages.subject: What would -you- like to see?!
messages.msgSnippet: I m in a bit of a quandary as to what to draw next, so I thought I d ask you guys! What would you like to see? Aizu Women s Brigade? Mini-manga about SHQ?
messages.messageBody:
I'm in a bit of a quandary as to what to draw next, so I thought I'd ask you
guys! What would you like to see? Aizu Women's Brigade? Mini-manga about
SHQ? Hijikata in a fundoshi? All of the above? Let me know-- I'd like to
start adding to our archive here!!

--M.
